Steps to reproduce:
1.New a library "LibA", add a label
2.New a report, includes the library and extends LibA.label
3.Open the library, change the font color of label to red
4.Switch to the report, refresh it

Expected result:
The font of label in report turns to red

Did you reopen the report design file? We don't support the editing library and report design file currently. There is also resource synchroniz problem existed for the workspace.
Errors in LibraryCommand.reloadLibrary(). Have been fixed.
